content:
Hi All,
I have gone through the DaVinci CDex IG http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-ecdx/toc.html ,but I'm not able to understand how the clinical data has been tranferred between the resources, what are the resources used and what transactions need to be done for dataexchange.I have also observed the transactions in HSPC sandbox present in FHIR confluence.
Can anyone suggest me?
Is any implementation still going on related to this project?

Hi All,
We have tried to launch the application in our sandbox ,it is working fine .But, the application in github has fixed references placed in the communication request resource ,fixed references in the sense we can't select other references other than these.But,the application is not for the sake of only one patient right? For example if we want to select patient or claim or encounter or practitioner or organization other than the references placed in the resource .Is it possible??
Can anyone suggest me?
Thanks in advance..
